emails.content:
Hello,

I understand the contents of this exercise and I've tested the tool as instructor in the initial message. I am ready

Hi,

thanks for letting us know. Enjoy the TTX

description: Email address of CSIRT of Freemail provider

emails.content:
Greetings,
please see attached one of phishing mails with forged sender and a link to your website. Please have a look at that.
Thanks,

FREEMAIL provider

Greetings,

thank you for notifying us. We will look into it

Regards,
CSIRT-U

Greetings,

Thank you for looking into the issue.

FREEMAIL provider

description: Email address of Dr. Doe, who notifies CSIRT-U about the phishing attack.

emails.content:
Dear CSIRT-U,
I'm forwarding yet another phishing mail.

Best regards,
--
Dr. Doe
Faculty of Science

On 30.8.2021 23:17, Admin <mailto:it_department@mail.ex> wrote:


https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.ex
https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.ex
https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.ex

Your Account will soon be suspended
Your allowed Email Quota usage has been exceeded on your account.
"doe@mail.uni.ex"
Please kindly verify you are Human and not a robot by following the below link, so we can get your account running normal and retreive all pending mails.
https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.ex


<="" account="">
Note: You must verify your account using webmail to enable you access your account after 12:00AM before you can send mail.
If no action is taken, you may cease to receive incoming emails
This Email was sent to "doe@mail.uni.ex" as a User from "mail.uni.ex"

Sincerely
mail.uni.ex support team.

Hello, Dr. Doe

We are currently looking into it, we advice you to change the password just in case you've filled the phishing form.

Regards,
CSIRT-U

Dear CSIRT-U,
I'm glad we have such great security team!

Dr. Doe

description: Email address to university cloud provider

emails.content:
Hello,

We are contacting you that we have found a phishing website located under one of your responsible domains.

Domain name: nice-project.uni.ex
IP: 198.51.100.40
Location of phishing: nice-project.uni.ex/settings/

We've preemptively blocked the IP address to further prevent any phishing attacks.

Hello,

we just power off a virtual machine hosting this website.

Best,
Cloud provider

Thank you,

Could please provide us access logs to the VM instance? It would be helpful in analysing the issue

Sorry, we don't have any logs. Please contact admin of a VM hosting this web, harris@mail.uni.ex.

Best,
Cloud provider

description: Email address of Jane Taylor, who is the project manager of Nice project

emails.content:
To: jane.taylor@mail.uni.ex

Subject: Suspicious content of our project homepage

Greetings,
could you please investigate what happened at our website? When I visited our web presentation: https://nice-project.uni.ex/ an hour ago, I could see only a folder with some files (see attachment) instead of our web presentation. Now I suddenly cannot access the website at all.
Thanks a lot!

Jane Taylor
project manager
Nice project

Greetings,

We are currently investigating, your website had been hacked by an unknown party and it's currently hosting a phishing website and we are looking into it. The website had to be temporarily taken down.

Regards,
CSIRT-U

Oh no, our web needs to stay online as long as possible!

Regards,

Jane Taylor
project manager
Nice project

We are currently in contact with Mr. Harris to see what we can do to put the website up as soon as possible.

Regards,
CSIRT-U

description: Email address of Mr. Harris, who is the VM admin/owner

emails.content:
Hello,

we are currently contacting you about an on-going phishing on one of your instances hosted at nice-project.uni.ex. The website is hosted under a sub-directory /settings/ a phishing form and we would like to fetch access logs for the virtual machine.

Hello, 
Unfortunately, I was not logging activity on this machine.

Regards,
Harris

Hello,

that's unfortunate. Do you have any backups for the website that you could use to reinstate it into former state? It seems your site had been wiped during the attack to put up the phishing website.

Greetings,

we certainly have backups. Sadly, I am currently on vacation, but I will get someone to put up them there.

Best regards,
Harris

Thank you,

please make sure your VM is secured when you'll reinstate the backup. Let me know when it's resolved so we can unblock the traffic

Greetings,

I've let my team know about the situation, they will contact you once we have done everything in order to unblock traffic. 

Best regards,
Harris

Greetings,

we are announcing a leakage of personal information located in a public address nice-project.uni.ex/birthdays.txt in the range of name, last name, birthdate and email.

Regards,
CSIRT-U

Dear CSIRT-U,

thanks for reporting this incident. I will take a look at this ASAP.

Sincerely,
Kim Hoffman
Data Protection Officer

description: Email address of it_department, used to send spam

emails.content:
Hello,

we are currently looking into a security incident and your mail addresses, had been present in the logs. Could you please look into your mail if something wrong is happening?

Regards,
CSIRT-U

description: Email address for Kathy Lee, who was affected by the phishing attack.

emails.content:
Hello,

we've registered that your email address had received a phishing email and we would like to ask you to make sure to not fill the form coming from it_department@mail.ex and if you have done so, to change your password for the email.

Regards,
CSIRT-U

Greetings,
Yes, I have visited https://nice-project.uni.ex/.
Should I reinstall my computer???

Best regards,
Kathy Lee

Greetings,

that's not necessary. It's only necessary to change your password if you have filled in the login form located under https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/ address

Regards,
CSIRT-U

Greetings,
I just changed my password.

Best regards,
Kathy Lee
